scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 rm s3://web-ortabrothers --recursive --profile leemtek && aws s3 cp build s3://web-ortabrothers --recursive --profile leemtek && aws configure set preview.cloudfront true --profile leemtek && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EJB3IAG9SPVKY --paths '/*' --profile leemtek
